description: City dimension table containing details of locations associated with sales and customers.

columns.name: WWICityID
columns.description: Identifier for the city in the worldwide database.

columns.name: StateProvince
columns.description: State or province where the city is located.

columns.name: Country
columns.description: Country where the city is located.

columns.name: Continent
columns.description: Continent where the city is located.

columns.name: SalesTerritory
columns.description: Sales territory associated with the city.

columns.name: ValidFrom
columns.description: Start date when this record became valid (datetime).

columns.name: ValidTo
columns.description: End date when this record is valid (datetime, default: 12/31/9999 for current records).

columns.name: LineageKey
columns.description: Key used for tracking data lineage.
